name: @stiwi/pixelsrc-wasm
description: WebAssembly build of pixelsrc pixel art renderer

scripts.build: cd .. && wasm-pack build --target web -- --no-default-features --features wasm && rm -rf wasm/pkg && mv pkg wasm/
scripts.build:nodejs: cd .. && wasm-pack build --target nodejs -- --no-default-features --features wasm && rm -rf wasm/pkg && mv pkg wasm/
scripts.build:bundler: cd .. && wasm-pack build --target bundler -- --no-default-features --features wasm && rm -rf wasm/pkg && mv pkg wasm/
